reviewText: My caption deals with the DVD. But newcomers to the work of Noam Chomsky could well consider Amazon's exceptionally well-organized "Books by Noam Chomsky" page with 169 entries. At least 34 entries are on Kindle. I've several of his books and audio recordings in my library. Seldom does any author survive fact-checking as Noam Chomsky does. His presentation style is flawless - completely free of "You know...You know..." and "And er...And er..." bad speech habits. One could call him a role model for Toastmasters International. However, with all respect to a great scholar, I think that, generally speaking, for "talking heads" presentations (without any graphics or charts) there is little extra value in video over high quality audio alone. Having said that it is good now and then to see what a vital alert 85 old looks like. Mafia Principle Of Global Hegemony: The Middle East, Empire & Activism Chomsky, Noam - Mafia Principle Of Global Hegemony: Middle East, Empire, & Activism
